</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +9

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

+2 status to all saves vs. [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)
</row>

**HP** 45

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +12,
**Damage** 1d6+6 bludgeoning plus Strangling Grasp

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_warhammer_ +13 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Hobji's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Strangling Grasp** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Trigger** Hobji hits a Medium or smaller creature with his fist Strike; **Effect** The creature is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), and Hobji begins to strangle the creature. The creature is suffocating and can't speak as long as it's strangled. This prevents it from casting spells with a verbal component or activating items with a command component.

**Surprise Attack**   In the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to Hobji.

</column>
